name: GrandeMASCARA Conditioning Peptide Mascara
about: What it is:.What it does:.What it is formulated WITHOUT:.What else you need to know:.Research results:
ingredients: -Peptides (Myristoyl Pentapeptide-17): Help to strengthen and fortify for healthier looking lashes..-Natural Wax Blend: The softer texture of beeswax helps to promote volume, while a harder carnauba wax pulls lashes to extend them to their full length....Aqua/Water/Eau, Paraffin, Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Beeswax/Cera Alba/Cire d'abeille, Cholesterol, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Cera Carnauba/Cire de Carnauba, Triethanolamine, Ultramarines (CI77007), Nylon-12, Cetyl Esters, Glycerin, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Phenoxyethanol, Aminomethyl Propanediol, Panthenol, Propylene Glycol, Hydrated Silica, Ethylhexylglycerin, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Disodium Phosphate, Polysorbate-60, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Tocopherol, Sodium Phosphate, Benzoic Acid, Myristoyl Pentapeptide-17, Sodium Benzoate, Glyoxal.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:..-Step 1: Sweep mascara brush from lash base to tips...-Step 2: Apply multiple coats for volume. ..-Step 3: May be removed with makeup remover or soap and water....-Tip: Apply with GrandePRIMER for an instant false-lash look.

I brush through with the brush after applying a few coats of mascara, while mascara is still wet. Highly recommend if youu2019re looking for something that is gentle on lashes / promotes lash health AND gives good volume and length!

I have worn it lots inside and by the end of the day I can see it under my eyes a bit but not any more than other mascaras.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing mascara! Itu2019s very lengthening and makes your lashes look great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't wear much makeup - every day for work I wear mascara only, if I am going out I will put on some eyeliner and mascara and MAYBE some BB cream. So needless to say, mascara is my shotgun rider, so I can be pretty picky. I hate when they are too clumpy, or make your lashes look like spider legs, and when they smudge or flake. I am absolutely obsessed with this mascara, it is perfectly light to go with my bare face during the week, but can be layered for a bit more of a dramatic look on the weekends. It doesn't flake at all. I also have pretty oily skin, and it doesn't smear in the corner of my eyes like a lot of other mascaras. I teeter between (drugstore) Falsies and Better than Sex or Damn Girl. This tops them all, it is perfect for how I use it.

reviews.review_title: My search for the perfect mascara is over!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finally found the right mascara for me!!  I have tried the more expensive mascaras and I was always disappointed.  I had resigned myself to Diorshow after trying literally dozens of brands. Then I received a sample of Grande Mascara and fell in love instantly. I see other people saying they use it with primer and then apply multiple coats but I am always in a hurry in the mornings and I just use one good coat on my naked, short, pale and virtually nonexistent lashes and it works miracles!  I get compliments on my lashes weekly.  This product doesnu2019t flake but I because I rub my eyes when they are tired, I do occasionally get a little smudging but I blame that on me and not the mascara. Oh, I work a job where I occasionally get called out to work at night and on the weekends and I have even been able to pull off wearing this for two days straight.  NO other mascara ever has been able to rock a second day for me.  I now keep a new one in reserve at all times because I donu2019t want to run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin

I tried this mascara by itself and then I tried with the primer. With the primer, my lashes looked like fake lashes. If you like fake lashes then these products are perfect for you because it is easier than putting fake lashes on. The mascara dries really quick on the primer, so itu2019s better to do an eye one at a time so that you have time to clean or fix something before it dries.

I like that itu2019s more natural looking then many other mascaras (once you get the amount right.) I rub my eyes habitually, and it seems to be able to handle my abuse without running, so thatu2019s a huge bonus. It can get a bit clumpy if youu2019re not careful when using with their primer u2014 but I like the dramatic u201cfake lashesu201d look they produce together, so itu2019s worth the work. I received this product for free as a tester, but I would purchase it again. The photograph is with the Grande Mascara and Primer together.

reviews.review_text: At first I was sceptical about this product because I don't really like the packaging and I'm the kind of person who judges a product by its packaging :))))) but then I received this product as a free sample and decided to test it out. First impression of the product was that it's very easy to use. It has a good applicator and my lashes don't get clump. It doesn't make my eyelashes super long and thick though but it does a great job for a daily mascara because it stays the whole day and it doesn't smudge easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like this Grande mascara by itself (without using the Grande primer). Itu2019s vedh buildable but does not make my lashes clumpy. It looks very natural and long. It doesnu2019t smudge or blacken my lower waterline like some other mascaras do. I like the brush, it really helps with making separating my lashes for a voluminous look. I definitely recommend this mascara. I received this product for free to test and provide my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, fairLight skin tone
reviews.review_text: I received this free as a sample, but I would not purchase this. I was not a fan of the little clumps it left on my eyelashes at all, and how gooey the formula seemed to be. Every time that I would take the wand out, a goo trail of the mascara followed. I do like the way that it looks once the clumps are gone, but not enough to purchase again. I used the primer with it multiple times, but the mascara never seemed to fully coat the white primer. Not a fan of this mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this mascara complementary in my VoxBox. It's a really good product I love the extension that gives my lashes as well as the fullness however I prefer a thinner brush that will help separate the lashes better. Overall is a great product.

reviews.review_title: Only complaint is the brush style

reviews.review_text: I only gave it 3 star's due to mainly the brush. It tends to cause my lashes to stick together when I apply the mascara, making them look sparse and clumpy. If the brush was like the one that comes with the primer it would do better at coating each lash separately for a fuller lash look. The mascara worked nicely when I used a different brush like the primer one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am very picky with mascara. I like this product I just wish it so much of it wouldn't come out. I can get past that though because it does wonder to my lashes. I received this product from influenster

reviews.review_text: The mascara held up very well during my 10 hour work day, I was impressed and happy to not have any clumps or smudges by the end of the day. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I gave this mascara a 3 Star review because it works for some people but it definitely wasnu2019t the right fit for me. As someone with extremely straight eyelashes, I use an eyelash curler before applying anything to my lashes. Although this product did thicken and lengthen, it also straightened my lashes right back out after using my curler. I let my friend sample the product who has naturally curly lashes, however, and it worked really well once she applied enough mascara to cover the whiteness of the primer which was also the Grande primer. Good product for some, just wasnu2019t the right fit for my lashes. I would recommend to those with naturally curly lashes. I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_title: Great For Long-Lasting Length and Volume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love trying different mascaras since there are so many unique formulas and brushes--every mascara is special in its own way! The Grande mascara applies and layers very easily (even on top of its sister primer) and gives lashes incredible length. My lashes are also a bit on the lighter side and I love how rich, black, and shiny this mascara makes my lashes look. While not necessarily advertised as waterproof, I wore this mascara while shoveling my steps in a blizzard yesterday and no product ran into my eyes, which is my least favorite thing to happen with a mascara. I also have deep-set eyes and the mascara wand does a great job of letting me reach the lashes on the inner and outer corners of my eyes without getting any product on my lid or brow bone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_text: Love this mascara and wear it everyday. I use it with the serum and am on my third bottle as now have longer, thicker lashes.

reviews.review_text: I was really trying to like it because of all the great reviews but I just can't seem to. Nothing fancy about it but the packaging. Does not curl my lashes or add length.

reviews.review_title: Nice mascara, but it doesn't last 3 months
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara because it initially delivers great volume and length without getting clumpy, but it only works well for me on its own (if I use it everyday) for about two months. After that point, the formula is too dry to be applied without seeing clumps or getting your lashes stuck together. If you don't mind going through your lashes with a clean spoolie or another, thinner mascara for your second or third coat as this one begins to dry, I definitely recommend it. The overall results are nice, and I'm going to re-purchase it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This mascara is great.  Conditioning, prevents lash fallout.  Applies nicely, rich black color.  You have to really build it to get the look but it builds and builds without looking clumpy.  Keeps lashes up without a curler.  Haven't noticed that it leaves any particles on my face or anything which is nice.  No strong scent.  My favorite mascaras were It Cosmetics superhero and Too Faced better than sex and now this one is it for now.  Will probably rotate between the three because a change is fun.

If you like Too Faced Better than False Lashes, you will also like this one. Very similar with regard to non-transfer yet easy to remove. Im in my late 20's and recently went on a mascara quest, tried Bobbi Brown, YSL, Benefit, couple by Dior, few from Too Faced, even the Feathers pretty packaging one. I found problems with each one ranging from mascara transfer to thick damaging formulas. Now I live in the south where a step outside at the wrong time will smug your pretty mascara even after you've set your entire face and under eye area. This mascara not only nourished my lashes but never transferred! Never Ever. Also, it comes off like a dream, no heavy handed tugging and pulling needed.

I bought it specifically because my eyes water a lot, and the product states that it is water resistant. The product once wet can wipe off and clump lashes together.  I like the applicator and it's probably the best non-waterproof mascara I've ever used.

So I'm on the hunt for a great waterproof or water resistant mascara. I thought I found it by all the great reviews. The formula applies really smooth and I didn't have any trouble with clumps. My lashes looked fantastic! Natural at first but built up to a wonderful volume. But throughout the day I noticed flaking under my eye. Day 2, I tested the water resistance with a splash of water. Nope. So the hunt continues.

I received this mascara in my Ipsy and immediately fell in love. It's amazing! Gives great length, super black and separates each lash. I'm the type of girl who uses 2-3 mascaras daily but since I've found this, it's been my go -to and the only one I use. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I never write reviews, but I have to for this mascara.  I am amazed by how great this mascara is and the length and volume it gives my lashes.  To avoid clumping make sure you're removing excess product and prepping your lashes with a comb so they're separate. I also hold my brush vertically and not horizontally and I've had no problems. My lashes look fake, they're so long and full!

Love that this is a simple brush which allows the right amount of mascara so you don't get messy. What I love best is that it doesn't flake and it's SO easy to remove. The company is known for GrandeLASH-MD which I Love so I tried the Grande Mascara which claims to be lash boosting and conditioning. I'm happy to put products that give me more then just cosmetics.

I LOVE trying new mascaras but had yet to find anything better than Roller Lash from Benefit. I even tried YouTube Tati's favorite Chantecaille Mascara but was unimpressed.....until now. And the price!!? Wow. Lengthens. Thickens. No clumps. No smudges. And lasts and lasts and lasts... This company is doing good things. Their Lash Serum has given me amazing natural lashes too. I'm very excited to see what else they develop in the future!
This is a decent mascara but for the price, it's nothing special. You definitely need 2 coats for that wow factor. I agree with others that it can clump. I will finish this but will not repurchase

Wonderful dark glossy color, almost a bit too wet at first but I use Wander mascara first then this one after letting Wander dry a bit. More lengthening vs volume but this is a very good product! Highly recommend. My lashes look so good as I wear glasses too. I have also used their lash growth. Good stuff!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: I like this mascara fine, but probably would not repurchase. It does make my lashes look fairly natural (a sort of your lashes but better look), but it clumps very easily. I often have to pinch the tips of my lashes to get tiny clumps/excess off. You can see such tiny clumps/excess on the model's eyelashes in the example photos provided by the company! So clearly I'm not the only one with this problem. I will probably return to Marc Jacobs O-Mega lash or DiorShow Iconic when this runs out--both are more expensive, but more reliable too.

I've been on the hunt forever for a mascara that gives me everything I want: length, volume, non-clumpy, no flaking or smudging and this is the closest thing I've found! One coat is pretty meh but wow, that second coat brings my lashes to life. Absolutely no flaking and very minimal smudging after about 12 hrs of wear. Sometimes it's worth it to splurge on products and for me, this is totally worth it. SO happy I gave this a shot! Would love to try the lash serum next!

reviews.review_title: Perfect for pairing with another mascara-- Read on
reviews.review_text: The formula and brush is a great match! It really doesn't clump, but I would say it's more of a lengthening mascara, not too volumizing (unless you try to layer it on top of itself and then it gets clumpy). HOWEVER, it's a perfect add on mascara to another one OR a lash conditioner that adds volume. I love to use it on top of my Guerlain La Petite Robe mascara to give myself the dramatic lash look. But not everyone likes to layer 2 mascaras. This would be best for someone just looking for lengthening.

I have been using urban decays perversion mascara and primer. I love the length and volume they give me but the mascara tends to smudge/flake a little.  I was looking for a mascara that would do the same but without the smudging/flaking.  I think I saw a YouTuber talk about grande cosmetics so I searched for it on Sephora and read the reviews on the mascara and decided to purchase it.    I'm so glad I did as this mascara is the best I've used.  It gives me some volume and also length and I can build it up to give me some drama.  It's not as dramatic as perversion but for everyday, it gives enough drama.  The best part is that It doesn't Flake or smudge at all and somehow it helps give my straight lashes some curl without using an eyelash curler.  I do use this with the grande primer and they work great together.    For reference, I have oily lids and sensitive eyes and this mascara doesn't irritate my eyes.  Love it!!

I am a total mascaras snob. I use only two brands. I tried this because I was running out of my everyday mascara and it popped up as I was looking for my usual. It impressed me. I love the brush. I really hate all the curvy, butterfly, swirly brushes. A simple, basic brush is the best for applying mascara. This brand gets that. I'm glad I tried it. Will be buying a backup.
I would wear this to the gym, that's about it. Doesn't do much except made my lashes blacker, maybe a bit of volume. I don't get the hype at all.

I got this in a subscription bag and so I can give my review! This maaaavaaalassss mascara changed my eye game! I got length and thickness without being clumpy. I usually apply three coats but I have done it in two so the formula stands true. Easy to remove with water. I have been using it every day and will purchase again. I will be giving away my unused mascara  samples and full size because I found what I've been looking for!
Got this in my ipsy bag and I love it! Doesn't flake off and gives a nice full (but not cakey) look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I received this in an ipsy bag and was pleasantly surprised given i had never heard of this brand before. it's a wetter formula but i still like it and it doesnt flake which is nice given its not waterproof which is normally all i wear. i got good volume from this but the length could be better

I'm picky with mascaras and this one for sure is one to keep. It gives my lashes amazing length and a little bit of volume. However, I can give them more volume by adding a couple of more coats. The one recommendation I can give is that don't use this with a lash primer; specifically, the Lancu00f4me primer. I have not used the Grande primer yet but with the Lancu00f4me primer, it started flaking. Without it, it worked out beautifully. I recommend this mascara!

I'm really limited to what mascara I use cause everything runs on me,  especially living in the AZ heat. This stays put and my eyelashes look so thick and not clumpy. Ive also been using their last growth and I can tell they're getting so long!
I've been using this for a while now. No clumps no flakes. love it

Received this mascara in a subscription bag and wasn't wowed when I received it BUT when I used it I loved it! Love the wand and the packaging feels a little heavy very nice quality! Will defiantly purchase when mine dried up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I received a full size sample of this in a subscription box and my first thought was another mascara?!  (I had a second full size mascara in another subscription box that month and was drowning in a lifetime supply of mascara samples I have picked up along the way.)    For a while now I have been bouncing between Dior, YSL and Too Faced BTS ... not sure what made me open this sample and give it a try when I have open tubes of all of my favorites and a ton of samples I have been looking forward to trying for a while because of an interesting brush or a promise the formula makes, but I did ... and may have found my new favorite.  I have been using it for about 2 weeks now - the formula is great and clump free.  It is the perfect consistency between wet and dry - wet enough to evenly coat, thick enough to show up and give great volume.  The brush looks like nothing special (then again, when comparing to Diorshow or BTS, I guess most brushes look run of the mill ...) but it evenly coats and separates lashes.  I don't find it flakey and it lasts all day until I take it off.  It is a really deep black - looks great with liquid liner or no liner at all - really makes my eyes pop.  Not sure if this is thanks to the mascara or not, but before I started using it, I noticed some of the eyelashes on one eye seemed broken off and much shorter - not noticing those broken lashes anymore and my lashes seem softer and better conditioned.  Credit may be entirely or even mostly due to changing to an oil makeup remover/cleanser, but at the absolute least it is not drying my lashes out or making them brittle - my lashes look and feel great even after I remove the mascara.  I had never heard of Grande Cosmetics and in one month, 2 subscription boxes had Grande samples ... and I really liked them both!  I have a feeling that when this tube runs out, I may give away my sample stash and just buy a new tube of Grande Mascara!
